languages.text: "Вечный круговорот жизни и смерти. Место упокоения предков и бесконечный источник их мудрости". {n}Тонкие пальцы Ирлиэт сплетают в воздухе замысловатые узоры.{/n} "Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дитя Азуриана{/g} погибает, его дух перемещается в путеводный камень, а по возвращении на {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мир-корабль{/g} помещается в {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контур бесконечности{/g}, где становится одним целым с душами тех, кто был до нас".

traits.locale_text: "Вечный круговорот жизни и смерти. Место упокоения предков и бесконечный источник их мудрости". {n}Тонкие пальцы Ирлиэт сплетают в воздухе замысловатые узоры.{/n} "Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дитя Азуриана{/g} погибает, его дух перемещается в путеводный камень, а по возвращении на {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мир-корабль{/g} помещается в {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контур бесконечности{/g}, где становится одним целым с душами тех, кто был до нас".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "An eternal circle of life and death. The place of repose for our ancestors and the bottomless well of their wisdom." {n}Yrliet's delicate fingers weave patterns in the air as she speaks.{/n} "When a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} dies, their spirit moves to the waystone and is returned to the {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} where it joins the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, becoming one with the spirits of all who have came before us."
languages.original_text: "Вечный круговорот жизни и смерти. Место упокоения предков и бесконечный источник их мудрости". {n}Тонкие пальцы Ирлиэт сплетают в воздухе замысловатые узоры.{/n} "Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дитя Азуриана{/g} погибает, его дух перемещается в путеводный камень, а по возвращении на {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мир-корабль{/g} помещается в {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контур бесконечности{/g}, где становится одним целым с душами тех, кто был до нас".

traits.locale_text: "An eternal circle of life and death. The place where the ancestors find repose and the bottomless well of their wisdom." {n}Yrliet's delicate fingers are weaving patterns in the air.{/n} "When a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} dies, their spirit moves to the Waystone and is returned to the {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Craftworld{/g} where it joins the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, becoming one with the spirits of all who came before us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

The place of repose for our ancestors and the bottomless well of their wisdom." {n}Yrliet's delicate fingers weave patterns in the air as she speaks.{/n} "When a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} dies, their spirit moves to the waystone and is returned to the {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} where it joins the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, becoming one with the spirits of all who have came before us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “是生死之间永恒不息的循环。那里是我们先祖的安息之所，也是他们智慧的无底深井。”{n}伊莉耶特一边说着，一边用纤细的手指在空气中绘着图案。{/n}“每当{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}死亡时，他们的灵魂就会前往引路石处，返回{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}，成为{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}永恒回路{/g}的一部分，与所有先祖的灵魂融为一体。”
languages.original_text: "An eternal circle of life and death. The place of repose for our ancestors and the bottomless well of their wisdom." {n}Yrliet's delicate fingers weave patterns in the air as she speaks.{/n} "When a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} dies, their spirit moves to the waystone and is returned to the {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} where it joins the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, becoming one with the spirits of all who have came before us."

traits.locale_text: “是生死之间永恒不息的循环。那里是我们先祖的安息之所，也是他们智慧的无底深井。”{n}伊莉耶特一边说着，一边用纤细的手指在空气中绘着图案。{/n}“每当{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}死亡时，他们的灵魂就会前往引路石处，返回{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}，成为{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}永恒回路{/g}的一部分，与所有先祖的灵魂融为一体。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "An eternal circle of life and death. The place of repose for our ancestors and the bottomless well of their wisdom." {n}Yrliet's delicate fingers weave patterns in the air as she speaks.{/n} "When a Child of Asuryan dies, their spirit moves to the waystone and is returned to the craftworld where it joins the Infinity Circuit, becoming one with the spirits of all who have came before us."

languages.text: «Un ciclo eterno de vida y muerte. El lugar de descanso de nuestros ancestros y el pozo infinito de su conocimiento». {n}Los delicados dedos de Yrliet dibujan patrones en el aire mientras habla.{/n} «Cuando un {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijo de Asuryan{/g} muere, su espíritu pasa a la piedra del alma y se devuelve al {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g}, donde pasa a formar parte del {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuito Infinito{/g} para unirse a los espíritus de todos nuestros predecesores».
languages.original_text: "An eternal circle of life and death. The place of repose for our ancestors and the bottomless well of their wisdom." {n}Yrliet's delicate fingers weave patterns in the air as she speaks.{/n} "When a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} dies, their spirit moves to the waystone and is returned to the {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} where it joins the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, becoming one with the spirits of all who have came before us."

traits.locale_text: «Un ciclo eterno de vida y muerte. El lugar de descanso de nuestros ancestros y el pozo infinito de su conocimiento». {n}Los delicados dedos de Yrliet dibujan patrones en el aire mientras habla.{/n} «Cuando un {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijo de Asuryan{/g} muere, su espíritu pasa a la piedra del alma y se devuelve al {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g}, donde pasa a formar parte del {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuito Infinito{/g} para unirse a los espíritus de todos nuestros predecesores».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「生と死の永遠の輪。父祖の安息の地であり、知恵の底なしの井戸」{n}ユリエットの繊細な指が、話しながら空中に模様を描く。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}が死ぬと、その魂は方位石に移動し、{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}無限回路{/g}につながる{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}へと戻る。そうして、先人たちの魂とひとつになるのだ」
languages.original_text: "An eternal circle of life and death. The place of repose for our ancestors and the bottomless well of their wisdom." {n}Yrliet's delicate fingers weave patterns in the air as she speaks.{/n} "When a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} dies, their spirit moves to the waystone and is returned to the {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} where it joins the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, becoming one with the spirits of all who have came before us."

traits.locale_text: 「生と死の永遠の輪。父祖の安息の地であり、知恵の底なしの井戸」{n}ユリエットの繊細な指が、話しながら空中に模様を描く。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}が死ぬと、その魂は方位石に移動し、{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}無限回路{/g}につながる{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}へと戻る。そうして、先人たちの魂とひとつになるのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ein ewiger Kreislauf aus Leben und Tod. Der Ort der Rast für unsere Ahnen und der nie versiegende Quell ihrer Weisheit." {n}Yrliets zarte Finger zeichnen Muster in die Luft, während sie spricht.{/n} "Wenn ein {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kind von Asuryan{/g} stirbt, fährt seine Seele in den Wegstein und wird auf das {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g} zurückgebracht, wo sie sich der {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Unendlichkeitsmatrix{/g} anschließt und eins mit den Seelen aller wird, die vor uns kamen."
languages.original_text: "An eternal circle of life and death. The place of repose for our ancestors and the bottomless well of their wisdom." {n}Yrliet's delicate fingers weave patterns in the air as she speaks.{/n} "When a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} dies, their spirit moves to the waystone and is returned to the {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} where it joins the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, becoming one with the spirits of all who have came before us."

traits.locale_text: "Ein ewiger Kreislauf aus Leben und Tod. Der Ort der Rast für unsere Ahnen und der nie versiegende Quell ihrer Weisheit." {n}Yrliets zarte Finger zeichnen Muster in die Luft, während sie spricht.{/n} "Wenn ein {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kind von Asuryan{/g} stirbt, fährt seine Seele in den Wegstein und wird auf das {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g} zurückgebracht, wo sie sich der {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Unendlichkeitsmatrix{/g} anschließt und eins mit den Seelen aller wird, die vor uns kamen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Un cycle éternel de vie et de mort. Le lieu où reposent nos ancêtres et la source inépuisable de leur sagesse. » {n}Tout en parlant, Yrliet dessine des motifs dans les airs de ses doigts délicats.{/n} « Lorsqu'un {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfant d'Asuryan{/g} meurt, son esprit se transfère à la pierre gardienne puis retourne au {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g}, où il rejoint le {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuit d'Infinité{/g} pour ne faire plus qu'un avec les esprits de ceux qui nous ont précédés. »
languages.original_text: "An eternal circle of life and death. The place of repose for our ancestors and the bottomless well of their wisdom." {n}Yrliet's delicate fingers weave patterns in the air as she speaks.{/n} "When a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} dies, their spirit moves to the waystone and is returned to the {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} where it joins the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, becoming one with the spirits of all who have came before us."

traits.locale_text: « Un cycle éternel de vie et de mort. Le lieu où reposent nos ancêtres et la source inépuisable de leur sagesse. » {n}Tout en parlant, Yrliet dessine des motifs dans les airs de ses doigts délicats.{/n} « Lorsqu'un {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfant d'Asuryan{/g} meurt, son esprit se transfère à la pierre gardienne puis retourne au {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g}, où il rejoint le {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuit d'Infinité{/g} pour ne faire plus qu'un avec les esprits de ceux qui nous ont précédés. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ölüm ve yaşamın ebedî döngüsüdür. Atalarımızın sırtlarını dayayabilecekleri bir yer, bilgeliklerini barındıran dipsiz bir kuyudur." {n}Yrliet'in narin parmakları, havada desenler çizerek sözlerine eşlik ediyor.{/n} "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocuğu{/g} öldüğünde, ruhu yol taşına doğru harekete geçip {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünyaya{/g} geri döner. Burada {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Ebedî Devre'yle{/g} birleşerek bizden önce göçüp giden tüm ruhlarla bir bütün olur."
languages.original_text: "An eternal circle of life and death. The place of repose for our ancestors and the bottomless well of their wisdom." {n}Yrliet's delicate fingers weave patterns in the air as she speaks.{/n} "When a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g} dies, their spirit moves to the waystone and is returned to the {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} where it joins the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g}, becoming one with the spirits of all who have came before us."

traits.locale_text: "Ölüm ve yaşamın ebedî döngüsüdür. Atalarımızın sırtlarını dayayabilecekleri bir yer, bilgeliklerini barındıran dipsiz bir kuyudur." {n}Yrliet'in narin parmakları, konuşmasına havada desenler çizerek eşlik ediyor.{/n} "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocuğu{/g} öldüğünde ruhu yol taşına doğru harekete geçip {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünya{/g}ya geri döner. Burada {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Ebedî Devre{/g}'yle birleşerek bizden önce göçüp giden tüm ruhlarla bir bütün olur."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
